Actions.title: Scare the fate away
Actions.description: Try valiantly telling the terrible fate, that you ain't having that shit

Success.resultValue: You tell the terrible fate to suck it. He starts sobbing uncontrollably, and before you have a chance to apologize, he's already running away. You are a terrible person!

Failure.resultValue: The terrible fate doesn't go anywhere. It just stands there.

Actions.title: Sneak away
Actions.description: Leverage the possibility that the terrible fate didn't yet see you

Failure.resultValue: The terrible fate whispers to your ear 'Please. Don't go.' Yikes!

Actions.title: Deal with it
Actions.description: Lay down and face your fate

Success.resultValue: You lie down to wait for something to happen. Much to your surprise the terrible fate felt bad for you and gave you some coins. Good for you!
